value: description: Weekly News in the R Community.

An Rstudio shortcut everybody should know is Alt + Shift to create a multiline cursor. Huge time saver for code formatting! #rstats pic.twitter.com/s9EQMRk8kT

— Edwin Thoen (@edwin_thoen) October 11, 2019

#Rstats: Repeated measures ANOVA is traditionally a horrible nightmare in R. The `afex` package changes this. Easily specify a rm-model that gives identical results to SPSS using `afex::aov_car`. Automatically applies the GG correction.

install.packages("afex")#phdchat pic.twitter.com/aUPwoVSvcQ

— Guy Prochilo üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà (@GuyProchilo) October 12, 2019
